verses.verse: And he entered <S%G1684><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a ship, <S%G4143><s%> and passed <S%G1276><s%> over, <S%G1276><s%> and came <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> city. <S%G4172><s%>

And, behold, <S%G2400><s%> they brought <S%G4374><s%> to him a man sick <S%G3885><s%> of the palsy, <S%G3885><s%> lying <S%G906><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> a bed: <S%G2825><s%> and Jesus <S%G2424><s%> seeing <S%G1492><s%> their faith <S%G4102><s%> said <S%G4483><s%> to the sick <S%G3885><s%> of the palsy; <S%G3885><s%> Son, <S%G5043><s%> be of good cheer; <S%G2293><s%> your sins <S%G266><s%> be forgiven <S%G863><s%> you.
And, behold, <S%G2400><s%> certain <S%G5100><s%> of the scribes <S%G1122><s%> said <S%G4483><s%> within <S%G1722><s%> themselves, <S%G1438><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> man blasphemes. <S%G987><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> knowing <S%G1492><s%> their thoughts <S%G1761><s%> said, <S%G4483><s%> Why <S%G2443><s%> <S%G5101><s%> think <S%G1760><s%> you evil <S%G4190><s%> in your <S%G5216><s%> hearts? <S%G2588><s%>

For whether <S%G5101><s%> is easier, <S%G2123><s%> to say, <S%G2036><s%> Your sins <S%G266><s%> be forgiven <S%G863><s%> you; or <S%G2228><s%> to say, <S%G2036><s%> Arise, <S%G1453><s%> and walk? <S%G4043><s%>

But that you may know <S%G1492><s%> that the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%> to forgive <S%G863><s%> sins, <S%G266><s%> (then <S%G5119><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> he to the sick <S%G3885><s%> of the palsy, <S%G3885><s%>) Arise, <S%G1453><s%> take <S%G142><s%> up your bed, <S%G2825><s%> and go <S%G5217><s%> to your <S%G4675><s%> house. <S%G3624><s%>
And he arose, <S%G1453><s%> and departed <S%G565><s%> to his house. <S%G3624><s%>

But when the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> it, they marveled, <S%G2296><s%> and glorified <S%G1392><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> had given <S%G1325><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> to men. <S%G444><s%>

And as Jesus <S%G2424><s%> passed <S%G3855><s%> forth <S%G3855><s%> from there, <S%G1564><s%> he saw <S%G1492><s%> a man, <S%G444><s%> named <S%G3004><s%> Matthew, <S%G3156><s%> sitting <S%G2521><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> the receipt <S%G5058><s%> of custom: <S%G5058><s%> and he said <S%G3004><s%> to him, Follow <S%G190><s%> me . And he arose, <S%G450><s%> and followed <S%G190><s%> him.

And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass, as Jesus <S%G2424><s%> sat <S%G345><s%> at <S%G345><s%> meat in the house, <S%G3614><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> publicans <S%G5057><s%> and sinners <S%G268><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> and sat <S%G4873><s%> down <S%G347><s%> with him and his disciples. <S%G3101><s%>

And when the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> it, they said <S%G4483><s%> to his disciples, <S%G3101><s%> Why <S%G1302><s%> eats <S%G2068><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> Master <S%G1320><s%> with publicans <S%G5057><s%> and sinners? <S%G268><s%>

But when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> that, he said <S%G4483><s%> to them, They that be whole <S%G2480><s%> need <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5532><s%> not a physician, <S%G2395><s%> but they that are sick. <S%G2192><s%> <S%G2560><s%>

But go <S%G4198><s%> you and learn <S%G3129><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> that means, <S%G2076><s%> I will <S%G2309><s%> have mercy, <S%G1656><s%> and not sacrifice: <S%G2378><s%> for I am not come <S%G2064><s%> to call <S%G2564><s%> the righteous, <S%G1342><s%> but sinners <S%G268><s%> to repentance. <S%G3341><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> to him the disciples <S%G3101><s%> of John, <S%G2491><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Why <S%G1302><s%> do we and the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> fast <S%G3522><s%> oft, <S%G4183><s%> but your disciples <S%G3101><s%> fast <S%G3522><s%> not?

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G4483><s%> to them, Can <S%G1410><s%> the children <S%G5207><s%> of the bridal chamber <S%G3567><s%> mourn, <S%G3996><s%> as long <S%G1909><s%> as the bridegroom <S%G3566><s%> is with them? but the days <S%G2250><s%> will come, <S%G2064><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> the bridegroom <S%G3566><s%> shall be taken <S%G522><s%> from them, and then <S%G5119><s%> shall they fast. <S%G3522><s%>

No <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> puts <S%G1911><s%> a piece <S%G1915><s%> of new <S%G46><s%> cloth <S%G4470><s%> to an old <S%G3820><s%> garment, <S%G2440><s%> for that which is put in to fill <S%G4138><s%> it up takes <S%G142><s%> from the garment, <S%G2440><s%> and the rent <S%G4978><s%> is made <S%G1096><s%> worse. <S%G5501><s%>

Neither <S%G3761><s%> do men put <S%G906><s%> new <S%G3501><s%> wine <S%G3631><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> old <S%G3820><s%> bottles: <S%G779><s%> else <S%G1490><s%> the bottles <S%G779><s%> break, <S%G4486><s%> and the wine <S%G3631><s%> runs <S%G1632><s%> out, and the bottles <S%G779><s%> perish: <S%G622><s%> but they put <S%G906><s%> new <S%G3501><s%> wine <S%G3631><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> new <S%G2537><s%> bottles, <S%G779><s%> and both <S%G297><s%> are preserved. <S%G4933><s%>

While he spoke <S%G2980><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things to them, behold, <S%G2400><s%> there came <S%G2064><s%> a certain ruler, <S%G758><s%> and worshipped <S%G4352><s%> him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> My daughter <S%G2364><s%> is even <S%G737><s%> now <S%G737><s%> dead: <S%G5053><s%> but come <S%G2064><s%> and lay <S%G2007><s%> your hand <S%G5495><s%> on her, and she shall live. <S%G2198><s%>
And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> arose, <S%G1453><s%> and followed <S%G190><s%> him, and so did his disciples. <S%G3101><s%>

And, behold, <S%G2400><s%> a woman, <S%G1135><s%> which was diseased with an issue <S%G131><s%> of blood <S%G131><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> years, <S%G2094><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> behind <S%G3693><s%> him, and touched <S%G680><s%> the hem <S%G2899><s%> of his garment: <S%G2440><s%>
For she said <S%G3004><s%> within <S%G1722><s%> herself, <S%G1438><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> I may but touch <S%G680><s%> his garment, <S%G2440><s%> I shall be whole. <S%G4982><s%>

But Jesus <S%G2424><s%> turned <S%G1994><s%> him about, <S%G1994><s%> and when he saw <S%G1492><s%> her, he said, <S%G2036><s%> Daughter, <S%G2364><s%> be of good comfort; <S%G2293><s%> your faith <S%G4102><s%> has made <S%G4982><s%> you whole. <S%G4982><s%> And the woman <S%G1135><s%> was made <S%G4982><s%> whole <S%G4982><s%> from that hour. <S%G5610><s%>

And when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the ruler's <S%G758><s%> house, <S%G3614><s%> and saw <S%G1492><s%> the minstrels <S%G834><s%> and the people <S%G3793><s%> making <S%G2350><s%> a noise, <S%G2350><s%>

He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Give <S%G402><s%> place: <S%G402><s%> for the maid <S%G2877><s%> is not dead, <S%G599><s%> but sleeps. <S%G2518><s%> And they laughed <S%G2606><s%> him to scorn. <S%G2606><s%>

But when <S%G3753><s%> the people <S%G3793><s%> were put <S%G1544><s%> forth, <S%G1544><s%> he went <S%G1525><s%> in, and took <S%G2902><s%> her by the hand, <S%G5495><s%> and the maid <S%G2877><s%> arose. <S%G1453><s%>
And the fame <S%G5345><s%> hereof <S%G3778><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> abroad <S%G1831><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> that land. <S%G1093><s%>

And when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> departed <S%G3855><s%> there, <S%G1564><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> blind <S%G5185><s%> men followed <S%G190><s%> him, crying, <S%G2896><s%> and saying, <S%G3004><s%> You son <S%G5207><s%> of David, <S%G1138><s%> have mercy <S%G1653><s%> on us.

And when he was come <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the house, <S%G3614><s%> the blind <S%G5185><s%> men came <S%G4334><s%> to him: and Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Believe <S%G4100><s%> you that I am able <S%G1410><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> this? <S%G5124><s%> They said <S%G3004><s%> to him, Yes, <S%G3483><s%> Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
Then <S%G5119><s%> touched <S%G680><s%> he their eyes, <S%G3788><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> According <S%G2596><s%> to your <S%G5216><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> be it to you.

And their eyes <S%G3788><s%> were opened; <S%G455><s%> and Jesus <S%G2424><s%> straightly charged <S%G1690><s%> them, saying, <S%G3004><s%> See <S%G3708><s%> that no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3367><s%> know <S%G1097><s%> it.
But they, when they were departed, <S%G1831><s%> spread <S%G1310><s%> abroad <S%G1310><s%> his fame <S%G1310><s%> in all <S%G3650><s%> that country. <S%G1093><s%>
As they went <S%G1831><s%> out, behold, <S%G2400><s%> they brought <S%G4374><s%> to him a dumb <S%G2974><s%> man <S%G444><s%> possessed <S%G1139><s%> with a devil. <S%G1139><s%>

And when the devil <S%G1140><s%> was cast <S%G1544><s%> out, the dumb <S%G2974><s%> spoke: <S%G2980><s%> and the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> marveled, <S%G2296><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> It was never <S%G3763><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> seen <S%G5316><s%> in Israel. <S%G2474><s%>
But the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> He casts <S%G1544><s%> out devils <S%G1140><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> the prince <S%G758><s%> of the devils. <S%G1140><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went <S%G4013><s%> about <S%G4013><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the cities <S%G4172><s%> and villages, <S%G2968><s%> teaching <S%G1321><s%> in their synagogues, <S%G4864><s%> and preaching <S%G2784><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of the kingdom, <S%G932><s%> and healing <S%G2323><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> sickness <S%G3554><s%> and every <S%G3956><s%> disease <S%G3119><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the people. <S%G2992><s%>

But when he saw <S%G1492><s%> the multitudes, <S%G3793><s%> he was moved <S%G4697><s%> with compassion <S%G4697><s%> on <S%G4012><s%> them, because <S%G3754><s%> they fainted, <S%G1590><s%> and were scattered <S%G4496><s%> abroad, <S%G4496><s%> as sheep <S%G4263><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> shepherd. <S%G4166><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> he to his disciples, <S%G3101><s%> The harvest <S%G2326><s%> truly <S%G3303><s%> is plenteous, <S%G4183><s%> but the laborers <S%G2040><s%> are few; <S%G3641><s%>

Pray <S%G1189><s%> you therefore <S%G3767><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> of the harvest, <S%G2326><s%> that he will send <S%G1544><s%> forth <S%G1544><s%> laborers <S%G2040><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his harvest. <S%G2326><s%>
